title: Upbound Group uses cookies to store opt-out preferences
statement: Opt-out choices on Upbound Group's website are stored via cookies and may be lost if cookies are cleared or blocked.

citations.quote: Please note that opt-out choices may be stored via cookies. If you clear cookies, if your browser blocks cookies, or if you view the page from a different browser or device, your opt-out choice may no longer be logged or recognized.
